sentences.sContent: ‘That’s the only possible solution.’ ‘Yes, I suppose so,’ Charles conceded.
sentences.sCn: “那是唯一可行的解决办法。”“对，我想是。”查尔斯承认道。

remMethod.val: con(带着) + ced(走) + e → 带着某物走 → 承认； 让步

trans.tranCn: 承认； 让步； 允许
trans.tranOther: to admit that something is true or correct, although you wish it were not true
